document.full_text: two skiers missing for nearly a week in grand teton national park in wyoming were found dead on sunday, buried in 15 feet of snow by an avalanche that likely smothered them as they slept, park officials said.
document.title: two missing skiers found dead in tetons
lines_and_colors: two skiers missing for nearly a week in grand teton national park in wyoming were found dead on sunday, buried in 15 feet of snow by an avalanche that likely smothered them as they slept, park officials said.
